languages.text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.
languages.original_text: Мастер-тактик отмечает противника. Если этого противника убьет кто-либо из союзников мастера-тактика до начала следующего хода мастера-тактика, этот союзник получит +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} союзника)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} и +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя. {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Бонус{/g} к характеристикам не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: The Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed before the beginning of the Tactician's next turn by Tactician's ally, that ally gains <u>10+2×(that ally's Resolve)</u> Momentum and +10 to all characteristics until the end of combat.

The Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed before the beginning of the Tactician's next turn by Tactician's ally, that ally gains <u>10+2×(that ally's Resolve)</u> Momentum and +10 to all characteristics until the end of combat.

The Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, that ally gains <u>10+2×(that ally's Resolve)</u> momentum and +10 to all characteristics until the end of combat.

The Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that ally gains <u>10+2×(that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} and +5 to all characteristics until the end of combat.

The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

languages.text: Мастер-тактик отмечает противника. Если этого противника убьет кто-либо из союзников мастера-тактика до начала следующего хода мастера-тактика, этот союзник получит +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} союзника)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} и +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя. {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Бонус{/g} к характеристикам не суммируется.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Тактик отмечает противника. Если этого противника убьет кто-либо из союзников тактика до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика, этот союзник получит <u>(10 + 2 × решимость союзника)</u> моментума и +10 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.

Тактик отмечает противника. Если этого противника убьет кто-либо из союзников тактика до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика, этот союзник получит <u>(10 + 2 × решимость союзника)</u> моментума и +10 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}标记一名敌人。如果该名敌人在战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前，被战术专家的盟友击杀，则该盟友会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于<u>（10+2×该名盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}）</u>，同时所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。属性加值效果无法叠加。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}标记一名敌人。如果该名敌人在战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前，被战术专家的盟友击杀，则该盟友会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于<u>（10+2×该名盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}）</u>，同时所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。属性加值效果无法叠加。

languages.text: El maestro táctico marca a un enemigo. Si ese enemigo es eliminado por uno de los aliados del maestro táctico antes de que empiece el próximo turno del maestro táctico, ese aliado gana <u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de ese aliado)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del combate. La {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a todas las características no es acumulativa.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} señala a un enemigo. Si ese enemigo es eliminado por uno de los aliados del maestro táctico antes de que empiece el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico, ese aliado gana <u>10+2×({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de ese aliado)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Der Meistertaktikermarkiert einen Feind. Wird dieser Feind von einem der Verbündeten des Meistertaktikers vor Beginn seines nächsten Zugs getötet, erhält dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes <u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} dieses Verbündeten)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} und +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf alle Eigenschaften wird nicht gestacked.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} markiert einen Feind. Wird dieser Feind von einem der Verbündeten des Meistertaktikers vor Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} getötet, erlangt dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes <u>10 + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} dieses Verbündeten)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} und +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} markiert einen Feind. Wird dieser Feind von einem der Verbündeten des Meistertaktikers vor Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} getötet, erhält dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes <u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} dieses Verbündeten)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} und +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf alle Eigenschaften wird nicht gestacked.

languages.text: Le maître tacticien désigne un ennemi. Si cet ennemi est éliminé par l'un de ses alliés avant le début du tour suivant de ce maître tacticien, l'allié bénéficie de <u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de cet allié)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g} et d'un bonus de +5 pour toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} appliqués à toutes les caractéristiques ne sont pas cumulables.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Le Tacticien désigne un ennemi. Si cet ennemi est éliminé par un de ses alliés avant le début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de ce Tacticien, l'allié bénéficie de <u>10 +2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de cet allié)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} et d'un bonus de +10 sur toutes les caractéristiques jusqu'à la fin du combat.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} désigne un ennemi. Si cet ennemi est éliminé par l'un de ses alliés avant le début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de ce maître tacticien, l'allié bénéficie de <u>(10 + 2 x {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de cet allié)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g} et d'un bonus de +5 pour toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} appliqués à toutes les caractéristiques ne sont pas cumulables.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は敵にマークする。戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まる前に、その敵が戦略の達人の味方に倒された場合、その味方は<u>(10 + 2 × 味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得て、戦闘終了まですべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+5増加する。すべての特性への{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は累積しない。
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は敵にマークする。戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まる前に、その敵が戦略の達人の味方に倒された場合、その味方は<u>(10 + 2 × 味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得て、戦闘終了まですべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}が+5増加する。すべての能力への{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は累積しない。

languages.text: Usta Taktisyen, bir düşmanı işaretler. O düşman Usta Taktisyen'in bir sonraki turunun başına dek Usta Taktisyen'in dost birimlerinden birince öldürülürse o dost birim, +<u>(10 + 2 × dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılığı{/g})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır ve tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} de 5'er puan artar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Niteliklere gelen bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician marks an enemy. If that enemy is killed by one of the Master Tactician's allies before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, that ally gains +<u>(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all characteristics does not stack.
